title: Fallout 4..... GG
body:
I have played  approximately 30 hours, but these last 2 days it crashes directly on load up. I updated windows 10 and now it will not load. The internet has not helped me, and Bethesda support basically said "get rekt" because I've played over the return time and i'm under the minimum specs (kinda, but it ran for 30 damn hours....) so they won't even attempt to help me.

GG. Guess I just wasted $60. (I might just download it on a desktop that is not really "mine" but I can use it somewhat freely.... but even then... it sucks)
